title: Offensive Player Names.
body: So, i was in a game with someone called '[REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]' is that really something that should be allowed in league?

replies.body: If it's offensive, report it! If they look at it and consider it relevant to warrant action they will. If not then there is an option to allow you to remove names during game.

So the issue here is how the system actually works.

Assuming a name gets deemed offensive, all that will occur is a forced name change, they won't even check to make sure that the name changed to doesn't end up being just as offensive, got someone on my friends list that basically just changes from racist name to racist name with no repercussions, so why not just do it?
My previous name was AsianJewSlitter. Best name ever, manually changed cuz waiting for something to happen but didn't.
